name: part_010
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】 I WILL NOW SHOW YOU MY BODY. 3Dお披露目 #Mori3D [maby2NKg7wI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope interacting with BOOGEY VOXX before the final song.

subtitles.original: （投げキッスの音）
subtitles.english: (Blows a kiss)

subtitles.original: やめろって！
subtitles.english: Stop it!

subtitles.original: おいおいおい。
subtitles.english: Whoa, whoa, whoa.

subtitles.original: やめろって、本当に。
subtitles.english: I told you to stop it, seriously.

subtitles.original: こわいって。
subtitles.english: It's creepy!

subtitles.original: Well, they said they're very happy to have a chance
subtitles.english: Well, they said they're very happy to have a chance

subtitles.original: to perform with me on stage because we always wanted to,
subtitles.english: to perform with me on stage because we always wanted to,

subtitles.original: right? We always wanted to perform together on the same stage.
subtitles.english: right? We always wanted to perform together on the same stage.

subtitles.original: So now, before their musical activities together end,
subtitles.english: So now, before their musical activities together end,

subtitles.original: we get a chance to do that, and I think that's really amazing.
subtitles.english: we get a chance to do that, and I think that's really amazing.

subtitles.original: So, we've got another song to do.
subtitles.english: So, we've got another song to do.

subtitles.original: This will be the last song for today.
subtitles.english: This will be the last song for today.

subtitles.original: This song is called "CROWN". Please enjoy.
subtitles.english: This song is called "CROWN". Please enjoy.

subtitles.original: Hey! Hey! Alright! One last time!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Alright! One last time!

subtitles.original: Yeah! Alright everybody, this has been Calliope Mori with BGV.
subtitles.english: Yeah! Alright everybody, this has been Calliope Mori with BGV.

subtitles.original: Check it out. Step across.
subtitles.english: Check it out. Step across.

subtitles.original: Yeah! Just breathe.
subtitles.english: Yeah! Just breathe.

subtitles.original: バーチャルお寿司のトラック 宣誓。
subtitles.english: Virtual Oshushi's track, swearing-in.

subtitles.original: 声が聞こえたんだ。
subtitles.english: I heard a voice.

subtitles.original: 神様は手の平返しが上手
subtitles.english: God is good at changing their mind.

subtitles.original: Geek to da JOBS. 荷も to da JAWS.
subtitles.english: Geek to the JOBS. Cargo to the JAWS.

subtitles.original: でも俺のmindはサバンナじゃねえ JOBS
subtitles.english: But my mind isn't the savanna, JOBS.

subtitles.original: Cuz, I'm NERD motherf**ker. up the 矜持 to the JOB
subtitles.english: Cuz, I'm a NERD motherf**ker. Up the pride to the JOB.

subtitles.original: 文脈を突破
subtitles.english: Breaking through context,

subtitles.original: したらもう戻れない だけどこの世界じゃ誰も俺らを殺せねえな
subtitles.english: and then there's no going back. But in this world, no one can kill us.

subtitles.original: Turn me up my homie.
subtitles.english: Turn me up my homie.

subtitles.original: エゴサーチの果て 届くくらいじゃフライヤー 呼べないぜバイブ
subtitles.english: The vibes at the end of an ego-search won't call for a flyer.

subtitles.original: 負けずに嗅ぎ取れ Boys & Girls
subtitles.english: Don't give in, sniff it out, Boys & Girls.

subtitles.original: 俺たちのマイク 病気と確信のバックラッシュ
subtitles.english: Our microphones. Sickness and the backlash of conviction.

subtitles.original: 研ぐ度増えるチップの数
subtitles.english: The number of chips increases every time we sharpen.

subtitles.original: 好きなときに食うとんかつ お前も立ってりゃいつかさあ
subtitles.english: Eating tonkatsu when I want. If you keep standing, someday...

subtitles.original: 病むよな 病むよな 一人で飲むのアルコール
subtitles.english: It's depressing, right? Drinking alcohol alone.

subtitles.original: 俺のこの声が明日へのバックボーン
subtitles.english: My voice is the backbone for tomorrow.

subtitles.original: テキーラはワンショットじゃつまんねえ
subtitles.english: One shot of tequila isn't enough.

subtitles.original: いつものクラブ いつもの席でお前のこと...
subtitles.english: In the usual club, at the usual seat, thinking of you...

subtitles.original: Never imagined my passion would lead to a success story.
subtitles.english: Never imagined my passion would lead to a success story.

subtitles.original: Shout outs to every worldian who's got love for me.
subtitles.english: Shout outs to every worldian who's got love for me.

subtitles.original: Wanna share that fabulous glory.
subtitles.english: Wanna share that fabulous glory.

subtitles.original: One-man show got nothing for me.
subtitles.english: One-man show got nothing for me.

subtitles.original: Self-serving walk the road alone no high hopes for the staff at your party.
subtitles.english: Self-serving walk the road alone no high hopes for the staff at your party.

subtitles.original: Remember rehab days.
subtitles.english: Remember rehab days.

subtitles.original: Light in the smoke-filled nights.
subtitles.english: Light in the smoke-filled nights.

subtitles.original: A pack of big-dreaming strays beneath those factory lights.
subtitles.english: A pack of big-dreaming strays beneath those factory lights.

subtitles.original: Broken boring kid exploring bridges between worlds.
subtitles.english: Broken boring kid exploring bridges between worlds.

subtitles.original: Found a voice amongst the noise, hey listen, out said girl.
subtitles.english: Found a voice amongst the noise, hey listen, out said girl.

subtitles.original: Looked for the chance in my midst, would not back down or back out.
subtitles.english: Looked for the chance in my midst, would not back down or back out.

subtitles.original: But I was pessimistic, almost missed it, drowning in doubt.
subtitles.english: But I was pessimistic, almost missed it, drowning in doubt.

subtitles.original: Will I ever make it big, is it worth it to try?
subtitles.english: Will I ever make it big, is it worth it to try?

subtitles.original: Like could I really see my picture on that billboard sign?
subtitles.english: Like could I really see my picture on that billboard sign?

subtitles.original: Am I out of my mind? Crashing back to days I felt spineless.
subtitles.english: Am I out of my mind? Crashing back to days I felt spineless.

subtitles.original: 仲間'S 優しさで I was saved by that kindness.
subtitles.english: With the kindness of my friends, I was saved by that kindness.

subtitles.original: What I find like the pages of the story that binds us.
subtitles.english: What I find like the pages of the story that binds us.

subtitles.original: We progressed, became our best, the footsteps adhering behind us.
subtitles.english: We progressed, became our best, the footsteps adhering behind us.

subtitles.original: このままで
subtitles.english: Just as it is.

subtitles.original: 零れてた
subtitles.english: Overflowing.

subtitles.original: 恋心 涙の数きりないけど
subtitles.english: My love, and countless tears.

subtitles.original: ただ走った
subtitles.english: I just ran.

subtitles.original: ただ辿り着いた
subtitles.english: I just arrived.

subtitles.original: 今懸けるよ 幸せを
subtitles.english: Now I'll stake my happiness on it.

subtitles.original: Yeah! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah! Yeah!

subtitles.original: CLAP! Come on, CLAP! CLAP!
subtitles.english: CLAP! Come on, CLAP! CLAP!

subtitles.original: CLAP! CLAP! Thank you! Yeah!
subtitles.english: CLAP! CLAP! Thank you! Yeah!

subtitles.original: Calliope. Yo, what's up Fra?
subtitles.english: Calliope. Yo, what's up Fra?

subtitles.original: Yo, カリ、こんなところまでありがとう。
subtitles.english: Yo, Cali, thanks for coming all this way.

subtitles.original: ところで俺たちが明日吸う予定のそっちの空気の味は？
subtitles.english: By the way, how's the air over there that we're planning to breathe tomorrow?

subtitles.original: ほら見て見て先輩、I've come a long way.
subtitles.english: Look, look, Senpai, I've come a long way.

subtitles.original: Still making moves from the views we knew from back in the day.
subtitles.english: Still making moves from the views we knew from back in the day.

subtitles.original: 俺もそうだ、長すぎる一年。お待たせさん。
subtitles.english: Me too, it's been a long year. Sorry to keep you waiting.

subtitles.original: 止まりそうな夜は背中を見ていたよ、ジョーズ。
subtitles.english: On nights that felt like they'd stop, I was looking at your back, Jaws.

subtitles.original: Had my back from the start, so I gotta say ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Had my back from the start, so I gotta say thank you.

subtitles.original: Be it this world or the next that we'll meet on every road.
subtitles.english: Be it this world or the next that we'll meet on every road.

subtitles.original: Still awake in my bed, above CDs I couldn't sell.
subtitles.english: Still awake in my bed, above CDs I couldn't sell.

subtitles.original: That's what you make, so instead, let it be your reason to rebel.
subtitles.english: That's what you make, so instead, let it be your reason to rebel.

subtitles.original: Far as this Reaper can tell, I was investing in me.
subtitles.english: Far as this Reaper can tell, I was investing in me.

subtitles.original: Penniless, sleeping in hell, that was a test for my being.
subtitles.english: Penniless, sleeping in hell, that was a test for my being.

subtitles.original: Seeing this dream brought to life before me.
subtitles.english: Seeing this dream brought to life before me.

subtitles.original: Every song that restored me, early mornings and chores, things they all led to Your Mori.
subtitles.english: Every song that restored me, early mornings and chores, things they all led to Your Mori.

subtitles.original: Always stay roaring into mics and facing all that comes fast.
subtitles.english: Always stay roaring into mics and facing all that comes fast.

subtitles.original: Me still gonna pour my life blood into this so Death can be happy.
subtitles.english: Me still gonna pour my life blood into this so Death can be happy.

subtitles.original: No matter compass for us, one thing that never did change.
subtitles.english: No matter compass for us, one thing that never did change.

subtitles.original: We're still the same wild vagabonds from a far-off age.
subtitles.english: We're still the same wild vagabonds from a far-off age.

subtitles.original: But in the name of refraining from dragging on things fast.
subtitles.english: But in the name of refraining from dragging on things fast.

subtitles.original: The victory march is on so pass along beyond this Mic-pass!!
subtitles.english: The victory march is on so pass along beyond this Mic-pass!!

subtitles.original: 本当のチャンスは俺たちに踏み絵を強要しない。
subtitles.english: A true chance doesn't force us into a loyalty test.

subtitles.original: この才能、このダストと言葉にしよう。さあやっておしまい。
subtitles.english: Let's put this talent and this dust into words. Now, let's get it done.

subtitles.original: Simon says でも耳を貸すな。Anyway says またライフよりかます MY SELF JUST THE BEAT
subtitles.english: Simon says, but don't listen. Anyway says, I'll rock more than life itself, JUST THE BEAT.

subtitles.original: 橋をかけることこそがドリーム。
subtitles.english: Building a bridge is the dream.

subtitles.original: それを渡って向こう岸に行くことがリアル。
subtitles.english: Crossing it to the other side is reality.

subtitles.original: いつも半歩先に居る 好奇心のゴースト 縦髪握る俺のウィル。
subtitles.english: Always half a step ahead. Curiosity's ghost, I'm holding onto its mane, my will.

subtitles.original: THIS IS THE MY WILL!
subtitles.english: THIS IS THE MY WILL!

subtitles.original: 死んでもいいと思える瞬間を 死んでもなお求めてる。
subtitles.english: I'm still seeking that moment where I feel it's okay to die even after death.

subtitles.original: 欲深き覚悟 受け取ったマイクで 全てを言葉にしたい。
subtitles.english: Greedy resolution. I want to put everything into words with this mic I've received.

subtitles.original: 神様 俺は世界だけじゃ物足りない。
subtitles.english: God, the world alone isn't enough for me.

subtitles.original: さよならも
subtitles.english: Farewells too...

subtitles.original: さよならも
subtitles.english: Farewells too...

subtitles.original: すり傷にしながら 獣道をゆく
subtitles.english: Taking scratches as we walk the path of beasts.

subtitles.original: 僕らだって
subtitles.english: We too...

subtitles.original: 今 手にしたんだ
subtitles.english: have now grasped it.

subtitles.original: だから歌うよ この声を
subtitles.english: So I'll sing out this voice.
